data.title: Best Movies Like Beverly Hills Chihuahua
meta_keywords: movies similar to Beverly Hills Chihuahua
data.meta_description: Movies Similar to Beverly Hills Chihuahua: Bingo (1991), Stuart Little (1999), Marmaduke (2010), Paulie (1998), Snow Dogs (2002), Disney's Air Bud (1997), Max (2015), Dr. Dolittle 2 (2001), Rufus (2016), Snow Buddies (2008)
